meta.description: Minimize the total number of transportation units required to transport at least 600 people per hour using trains and trams.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each transportation type in people per hour.

vars.name: num_units
vars.description: Number of transportation units of each type.

objective.name: min_total_units
objective.description: Minimize the total number of transportation units.

constraints.name: capacity_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 600 people can be transported per hour.

constraints.name: trams_twice_trains
constraints.description: The number of trams must be at least twice the number of trains.
